recipesJson.name: Key Lime Mojito
recipesJson.author: kindground
recipesJson.description: I worked on this a bit trying to balance the elements. It's a bit boozy to me but up the rum a smidge if so inclined. Coolant as you wish as well. The mint is there too so go easy. This recipe will also hold up pretty well to a steep. At 6 weeks there's not a ton of fade.
